node.title: Jimmy Fallon: Biden Can Cut Emissions Just as He Did His Ratings
node.alt: Jimmy Fallon celebrated the 100 countries that agreed to stop deforestation by 2030: “In other words, they agreed to stop giving the Brazilian rainforest a Brazilian.”
node.description: “I mean, he cut his approval rating in half in three months,” Fallon joked on Tuesday.
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "President Biden addressed world leaders at the U.N. Climate Conference on Tuesday, reiterating his commitment to cut carbon emissions in half by 2030.", "\u201cAnd he can do it,\u201d Jimmy Fallon said. \u201cI mean, he cut his approval rating in half in three months.\u201d", "Tom Hanks paid tribute to the late Peter Scolari, his \u201cBosom Buddies\u201d co-star, while on \u201cJimmy Kimmel Live.\u201d", "Kristen Stewart will talk about her latest role as Princess Diana on Wednesday\u2019s \u201cTonight Show.\u201d", "A new play details the real-life drama that unfolded on the set of the movie \u201cJaws,\u201d malfunctioning sharks and all."]
